song.title: Forever Gamer [feat. Xenomorph]
song.info:
Lyrics: Lyrics are as follows:
Niiiiiintendo .... wohoooo!
I remember a time that I was sitting alone. And playing my Amiga at home. Gaming Maniac Mansion and Lotus Turbo, and U.F.O Enemy Unknown. Sitting on my ass - doing nothing at all. But managing in Ports of Call. No chance in hell I would ever ever get bored of; killing NVA in Dogs of War.
Yeah, I'm a gamer forever. I'm gaming whatever. Together with my lads 'til I die. I'm gaming forever. I'm gaming whatever. Together with my ladies 'til I die.
Link to listen and download: http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/138041
